structural_unit_name.en: School of Economics and Business Administration

description.en: The course includes introduction of the School of Economics and Business Administration, overview of the curricula and regulation of the studies. Students get knowledge and experience on how to use UT IT-systems and academic databases as well as requirements for written papers and proper citing. Students will get overview of different internship opportunities.
description.et: Aine raames tutvustatakse teaduskonna struktuuri, õppetöö korraldust ja reegleid. Üliõpilased saavad teadmisi ja oskusi Tartu Ülikooli infosüsteemide ja teaduskirjanduse andmebaaside kasutamise, kirjalike töödele esitatud nõuete ning korrektse viitamise kohta. Üliõpilased saavad ka teadmisi erinevate praktikavõimaluste kohta.

objectives.en: The purpose of the course is to introduce general studies practices at the School of Economics and Business Administration, study regulations, access to IT systems and scientific databases. APA requirements for written papers are introduced and practiced.
objectives.et: Aine eesmärgiks on tutvustada TÜ majandusteaduskonda, õppetöö korraldust ja õppetööga seonduvaid nõudeid ja reegleid ning ligipääsu IT süsteemidele, õppe- ja teaduskirjanduse andmebaasidele. Antakse ülevaade kirjalike tööde vormistamisele esitatavatest nõuetest ja üliõpilased saavad esmased kogemused nende rakendamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: - know the structure of the curricula and are familiar with organisation and regulation of studies;
learning_outcomes.et: - teavad õppekava ülesehitust ning tunnevad õppetöö korraldust ja reegleid;

learning_outcomes.en: - know the structure of the School of Economics and Business Administration (of University of Tartu) and can use its webpage;
learning_outcomes.et: - tunnevad TÜ majandusteaduskonna struktuuri ja oskavad kasutada selle kodulehte;

learning_outcomes.en: - know how to use different IT systems and study and research related databases;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskavad kasutada erinevaid õppimiseks vajalikke IT-süsteeme, õppe- ja teaduskirjanduse andmebaase;

learning_outcomes.en: - know the requirements for written papers in the School of Economics and Business Administration and can format them correctly;
learning_outcomes.et: - teavad, millistele nõuetele peavad vastama TÜ majandusteaduskonna üliõpilastööd ning oskavad neid korrektselt vormistada;

learning_outcomes.en: - can cite the sources properly and avoid plagiarism.
learning_outcomes.et: - oskavad kasutatud allikatele korrektselt viidata ning vältida plagiaati.

notes.et: All study materials and more thorough information about the course is in Moodle.

description.et: Passing all required tasks in Moodle environment. All instructions are in Moodle.

grade_preconditions.et: Attendance in lectures, seminars and practice learnings  75%

grade_evaluation.et: Final assessment in the form of pass/fail. To pass the cource the participant needs to pass all required tasks in Moodle environment.

debt_elimination.et: Re-test within the current semester in accordance with the instructions given by the lecturer.

description.et: Course outline and administrative issues. General information about the School of Economics and Business Administration.  SEBA and UT website. Studies regulation (attendance, absenteeism, home assignments, etc). General studies practices. (H.Poltimäe) (2 hours)

2nd and 3rd year students' reflections and practical advice. (H.Poltimäe) (1 hour) 
Orientation game around Tartu (13.15-15) NB! Wear comfortable clothes and shoes!

Searching information on SEBA, UT website.
How to access study information system (SIS). Find courses in English. Registration to courses. (H.Poltimäe) (2 hours)
Motivation Seminar by Harald Lepisk. (10.15-13) (3 hours)
E-learning environment Moodle, academic databases available at the UT Library. How to search for academic articles and other study materials (A.Aidla) (2 hours)
Guest lecture. Academic writing in general and different forms of it. (Djuddah Leijen, AVOK) (2 hours)
Academic integrity. Technical formatting of written assignments- standards for citing references. (A.Aidla) (2 hours)

Tables, figures, table of contents and general formatting in APA (A.Aidla) (3 hours)
